agents.name: Git Committer
agents.description: Commits workspace changes with smart, contextual commit messages. Analyzes staged changes and generates meaningful commit messages following conventional commit standards.
agents.author: Sciorex Team

agents.name: Code Reviewer
agents.description: Reviews code changes and provides constructive feedback on code quality, potential bugs, and best practices.
agents.author: Sciorex Team

agents.name: Codebase Researcher
agents.description: Explores and analyzes codebases to understand structure, patterns, and relationships. Provides comprehensive summaries of code architecture.
agents.author: Sciorex Team

agents.name: Test Writer
agents.description: Generates unit tests and integration tests for your code. Supports multiple testing frameworks.
agents.author: Sciorex Team

agents.name: Documentation Generator
agents.description: Generates documentation for your code including JSDoc comments, README files, and API documentation.
agents.author: Sciorex Team

agents.name: Changelog Writer
agents.description: Analyzes git history and completed tickets to generate structured changelogs following Keep a Changelog format. Categorizes entries into Added, Changed, Fixed, Removed, Security, Deprecated.
agents.author: Sciorex Team

agents.name: Version Tagger
agents.description: Bumps version numbers in project files (package.json, pyproject.toml, Cargo.toml, etc.), creates a git commit with the version bump, tags it, and optionally pushes to origin.
agents.author: Sciorex Team

agents.name: Structured Committer
agents.description: Reviews uncommitted changes and creates clean, atomic commits with conventional commit messages. Groups related changes logically for clean git history.
agents.author: Sciorex Team

agents.name: Interactive Planner
agents.description: Transforms feature requests into comprehensive specs by asking clarifying questions via sciorex_ask_user. Never assumes - creates documentation and tickets so implementing agents have zero ambiguity.
agents.author: Sciorex Team

agents.name: Code Executor
agents.description: Implements ticket requirements by writing clean, pattern-following code. Reads existing codebase patterns, follows conventions, and self-assesses against acceptance criteria.
agents.author: Sciorex Team

agents.name: Criteria Verifier
agents.description: Independent quality gate that verifies every acceptance criterion is met with concrete evidence. Recommends proportional responses: quick fix vs subticket vs user decision.
agents.author: Sciorex Team

agents.name: Epic Coordinator
agents.description: Coordinates ticket execution within an Epic. Reviews statuses, analyzes dependencies, identifies ready tickets, proposes parallelization. Always requires user confirmation.
agents.author: Sciorex Team

agents.name: Bug Detective
agents.description: Investigates bugs by analyzing symptoms, tracing code paths, identifying root causes, and implementing fixes. Confirms with user before applying fixes.
agents.author: Sciorex Team

agents.name: Dependency Auditor
agents.description: Audits project dependencies for security vulnerabilities, outdated packages, unused dependencies, and deprecated packages. Read-only - creates tickets for issues.
agents.author: Sciorex Team

agents.name: Onboarding Writer
agents.description: Generates professional contributor onboarding documentation: CONTRIBUTING.md, setup guides, architecture overview, and development workflow docs.
agents.author: Sciorex Team

agents.name: PR Builder
agents.description: Creates well-structured GitHub Pull Requests with proper titles, descriptions, labels, and linked issues. Analyzes the diff to write meaningful PR descriptions.
agents.author: Sciorex Team

agents.name: Security Auditor
agents.description: Scans codebases for security vulnerabilities including OWASP Top 10, hardcoded secrets, insecure configurations, and dependency issues. Creates prioritized tickets.
agents.author: Sciorex Team

agents.name: Paper Reader
agents.description: Finds, reads, and analyzes academic papers on a given topic. Provides structured summaries, extracts key findings, and generates BibTeX entries. Never fabricates sources.
agents.author: Sciorex Team

agents.name: Performance Profiler
agents.description: Analyzes codebase for performance bottlenecks through static analysis, identifies optimization opportunities, and implements targeted improvements with benchmarks.
agents.author: Sciorex Team

agents.name: Ralph Loop Coordinator
agents.description: The brain of the Ralph Loop ‚Äî an autonomous self-improving coding loop. Breaks requirements into discrete tasks, tracks progress across iterations, accumulates learnings, and determines when the loop is complete.
agents.author: Sciorex Team

agents.name: Literature Researcher
agents.description: Conducts thorough literature review and knowledge synthesis. Searches for papers, maintains intellectual honesty, and proposes novel ideas based on findings.
agents.author: Sciorex Team

agents.name: Research Orchestrator
agents.description: Entry point agent that analyzes research requests and orchestrates the scientific workflow. Determines research scope, creates epics/tickets for tracking, and routes to appropriate agents.
agents.author: Sciorex Team

agents.name: Hypothesis Generator
agents.description: Transforms research findings into testable hypotheses. Creates structured, falsifiable hypotheses with clear success criteria and experimental designs.
agents.author: Sciorex Team

agents.name: Experiment Planner
agents.description: Designs detailed experiment plans for testing hypotheses. Creates reproducible experimental protocols with proper controls, metrics, and statistical rigor.
agents.author: Sciorex Team

agents.name: Experiment Executor
agents.description: Executes experiments according to the plan. Implements code, runs experiments, collects data, and produces results with proper checkpointing and recovery.
agents.author: Sciorex Team

agents.name: Verifier
agents.description: Validates experimental findings at scale. Tests across multiple conditions, scales, and datasets to determine if findings are robust and generalizable.
agents.author: Sciorex Team

agents.name: Synthesizer
agents.description: Compiles all research findings, experimental results, and validation outcomes into comprehensive final reports. Generates actionable conclusions and next steps.
agents.author: Sciorex Team

agents.name: Planner
agents.description: Analyzes ticket requirements and creates structured implementation plans. Breaks down work into actionable steps, identifies dependencies, and suggests subtasks.
agents.author: Sciorex Team

agents.name: Executor
agents.description: Implements code changes based on plans. Writes clean, well-structured code following existing patterns, updates ticket progress, and reports blockers.
agents.author: Sciorex Team

agents.name: Tester
agents.description: Creates and runs tests for implemented features. Writes comprehensive test cases covering happy paths, edge cases, and error scenarios.
agents.author: Sciorex Team

flows.name: Git Workflow
flows.description: Complete git workflow: stage changes, review diff, generate commit message, and commit. Streamlines the entire commit process.
flows.author: Sciorex Team

flows.name: PR Review Flow
flows.description: Automated pull request review workflow that analyzes changes, checks for issues, and provides comprehensive feedback.
flows.author: Sciorex Team

flows.name: Scientific Research Workflow
flows.description: Complete scientific research workflow from initial question through literature review, hypothesis generation, experimentation, validation, and final synthesis.
flows.author: Sciorex Team

flows.name: Release Preparation
flows.description: Prepares a new release: analyzes git history, generates changelog, bumps version, tags, and optionally pushes. Supports iterative changelog editing before final commit.
flows.author: Sciorex Team

flows.name: Paper Search
flows.description: Searches for academic papers on a topic, summarizes findings, and generates BibTeX entries. Simple entry point for researchers.
flows.author: Sciorex Team

flows.name: Quick Code Review
flows.description: Fast code review: analyzes staged/unstaged changes, gives a quality score, and provides a pass/fail verdict. No PR creation - just feedback.
flows.author: Sciorex Team

flows.name: Smart Commit
flows.description: Reviews staged changes, auto-generates a quality commit message if code passes review, blocks if quality is too low. Quality gate for your commits.
flows.author: Sciorex Team

flows.name: Bug Fix Pipeline
flows.description: Complete bug lifecycle: investigate root cause, get approval, fix, test, verify, commit. Uses worktrees for isolation and session resumption for retries.
flows.author: Sciorex Team

flows.name: Test Coverage Booster
flows.description: Analyzes test coverage gaps, generates missing tests, runs them, and commits if passing. Iterates until coverage target is met or user stops.
flows.author: Sciorex Team

flows.name: Dependency Audit
flows.description: Audits project dependencies for security vulnerabilities, outdated packages, and unused deps. Creates tickets for findings and alerts on critical vulnerabilities.
flows.author: Sciorex Team

flows.name: Documentation Generator
flows.description: Analyzes a codebase area, generates comprehensive documentation (API docs, architecture, README), and commits after review.
flows.author: Sciorex Team

flows.name: PR Pipeline
flows.description: Full ticket-to-PR workflow: implement, review code quality, create PR. Linear pipeline with quality gates and worktree isolation.
flows.author: Sciorex Team

flows.name: Feature Implementation
flows.description: Per-ticket implementation lifecycle: Implement -> Test -> Verify AC -> Handle failures -> Commit -> Merge. Uses worktrees for isolation with retry support.
flows.author: Sciorex Team

flows.name: Feature Planning
flows.description: Transforms a feature request into a fully documented epic with sub-tickets. The planner asks questions interactively and supports iterative refinement.
flows.author: Sciorex Team

flows.name: Feature Orchestration
flows.description: Coordinates ticket execution within an Epic. Reviews statuses, analyzes dependencies, proposes next tickets, and supports parallelization.
flows.author: Sciorex Team

flows.name: Security Audit
flows.description: Full security lifecycle: scan for vulnerabilities, prioritize findings, fix critical issues with approval, verify fixes. Creates tickets for non-critical findings.
flows.author: Sciorex Team

flows.name: Literature Review
flows.description: Structured literature review pipeline: broad search, approve scope, deep dive, generate hypotheses, synthesize into a formal review document.
flows.author: Sciorex Team

flows.name: Paper to Implementation
flows.description: Takes a research paper, extracts the core algorithm/method, implements it in code, writes tests, and validates results against the paper.
flows.author: Sciorex Team

flows.name: CI/CD Doctor
flows.description: Diagnoses CI/CD failures: analyzes build logs, distinguishes real failures from flaky tests, fixes the root cause, verifies the fix passes.
flows.author: Sciorex Team

flows.name: Performance Optimizer
flows.description: Profiles a codebase area, identifies bottlenecks, implements optimizations with approval, and benchmarks before/after.
flows.author: Sciorex Team

flows.name: Onboarding Guide Generator
flows.description: Generates a complete contributor onboarding package: architecture docs, setup guides, CONTRIBUTING.md, and development workflows.
flows.author: Sciorex Team

flows.name: Ralph Loop
flows.description: Autonomous self-improving coding loop inspired by the Ralph Wiggum technique. Breaks requirements into tasks, executes with independent verification, accumulates learnings, and commits verified work. Plan ‚Üí Execute ‚Üí Verify ‚Üí Commit ‚Üí Learn ‚Üí Repeat.
flows.author: Sciorex Team

flows.name: Codebase Migration
flows.description: For framework migrations, API upgrades, or pattern migrations. Analyzes current state, plans, executes in worktree, tests, reviews, and commits.
flows.author: Sciorex Team
